pages.text: This effect will protect player from Frosty effect, and will apply Frosty V to all enemies around you, effectively immobilize them.$(br2)Range of effect is marked with snowflake particles.
Obtainable from drinks and desserts made from Ice Bomb.$(br2)If you have this effect, you can freeze surrounding items on ground. Check JEI for Glacier Ice Tea for more info.
